meta.description: Minimize pollution from transporting cows using helicopters and trucks.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for moving cows.

params.name: cows_per_trip
params.description: Number of cows each transport mode can carry per trip.

params.name: pollution_per_trip
params.description: Pollution units produced per trip by each transport mode.

params.name: total_cows
params.description: Total number of cows that need to be transported.

params.name: max_truck_trips
params.description: Maximum number of truck trips allowed due to budget constraints.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips taken by each transport mode.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(trips[mode] * pollution_per_trip[mode] for mode in TRANSPORT_MODES)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution produced by the trips.

constraints.name: truck_trip_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of truck trips due to budget constraints.
